name: Build & Security Test (Python)
on:
  push: { branches: [ main ] }
  pull_request: { branches: [ main ] }
env:
  REGISTRY: registry.upx.exchange/exchange
  IMAGE_NAME: wallet
  IMAGE_TAG: v0.7.1
  COSIGN_KEY: sophielog
  SOPS_PASSPHRASE: sophielog
jobs:
  build-and-scan:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with: { python-version: "3.11" }
      - run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install -r requirements.txt
      - run: echo "No unit tests in demo"
      - name: Build Docker image
        run: docker build -t $REGISTRY/$IMAGE_NAME:$IMAGE_TAG .
      - name: Trivy image scan
        uses: aquasecurity/trivy-action@master
        with:
          image-ref: ${{ env.REGISTRY }}/${{ env.IMAGE_NAME }}:${{ env.IMAGE_TAG }}
          severity: CRITICAL,HIGH
          ignore-unfixed: true
          exit-code: 1
      - name: SBOM (Syft)
        uses: anchore/syft-action@v0.17.0
        with:
          image: ${{ env.REGISTRY }}/${{ env.IMAGE_NAME }}:${{ env.IMAGE_TAG }}
          format: spdx-json
          output: sbom.json
      - name: Cosign sign
        run: |
          echo "${COSIGN_KEY}" > cosign.key
          cosign sign --key cosign.key $REGISTRY/$IMAGE_NAME:$IMAGE_TAG
        env:
          COSIGN_PASSWORD: sophielog
      - name: Cosign verify
        run: cosign verify --key cosign.key $REGISTRY/$IMAGE_NAME:$IMAGE_TAG
  decrypt-secrets:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: build-and-scan
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Install sops
        run: |
          sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y gnupg curl
          curl -sSL https://github.com/mozilla/sops/releases/download/v3.7.1/sops-v3.7.1.linux > sops
          chmod +x sops && sudo mv sops /usr/local/bin/sops
      - name: Decrypt secret (demo)
        env: { SOPS_PASSPHRASE: ${{ env.SOPS_PASSPHRASE }} }
        run: |
          sops -d k8s/base/secret.enc.yaml | head -n 20 || true
